results.title: The impact of metformin use on the outcomes of locally advanced breast cancer patients receiving neoadjuvant chemotherapy: an open-labelled randomized controlled trial
results.text_hl: Moreover, 11.11% (n = 4) experienced grade I @<m>DISEASE_Arthralgia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018771 @@@arthralgia@@@, and no @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ experienced higher grade @<m>DISEASE_Arthralgia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018771 @@@arthralgia@@@ in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group.

citations.NLM: Barakat HE, Hussein RRS, Elberry AA, Zaki MA, Ramadan ME. The impact of metformin use on the outcomes of locally advanced breast cancer patients receiving neoadjuvant chemotherapy: an open-labelled randomized controlled trial Sci Rep. 2022 May 10;12(1):7656. PMID: 35538143

results.title: Insulin, Insulin Everywhere: A Rare Case Report of Rabson-Mendenhall Syndrome
results.text_hl: ...The excruciating @<m>DISEASE_Arthralgia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018771 @@@joint pain@@@ was alleviated with intravenous @CHEMICAL_Tramadol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014147 @@@tramadol@@@, 50 mg per day.

citations.NLM: Gosavi S, Sangamesh S, Ananda Rao A, Patel S, Hodigere VC. Insulin, Insulin Everywhere: A Rare Case Report of Rabson-Mendenhall Syndrome Cureus. 2021 Feb 4;13(2):e13126. PMID: 33728143

results.title: Report: Metformin potential in predisposing arthralgia, type II cross reactivity secondary to group A streptococcus infection & other comorbidities in treating PCOS.
results.text_hl: Report: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ potential in predisposing @<m>DISEASE_Arthralgia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018771 @@@arthralgia@@@, type II cross reactivity secondary to group @DISEASE_Pneumococcal_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D011008 @@@A streptococcus infection@@@ & other comorbidities in treating @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@.

results.title: [Sequential treatment with insulin glargine and metformin, and exenatide in a patient with newly diagnosed type-2 diabetes].
results.text_hl: After reduction of the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ dosage (500 mg twice daily) and discontinuance of @CHEMICAL_Exenatide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077270 @@@exenatide@@@ as well as a reduction of his physical activity (because of @<m>DISEASE_Arthralgia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018771 @@@joint pain@@@) for six months, the @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ control worsened.

citations.NLM: Kress S. [Sequential treatment with insulin glargine and metformin, and exenatide in a patient with newly diagnosed type-2 diabetes]. Dtsch Med Wochenschr. 2010 May;135(18):907-10. PMID: 20425675

results.title: GLP-1 receptor agonist-induced polyarthritis: a case report.
results.text_hl: After 6 months from the beginning of treatment, the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ complained of bilateral @<m>DISEASE_Arthralgia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018771 @@@arthralgia@@@ (hands, feet, ankles, knees, and hips).

citations.NLM: Ambrosio ML, Monami M, Sati L, Marchionni N, Di Bari M, Mannucci E. GLP-1 receptor agonist-induced polyarthritis: a case report. Acta Diabetol. 2014 Aug;51(4):673-4. PMID: 24158775
